actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to regulating food as drugs.
short_title: Foods Are Not Drugs Act of 1985

summary.text: Foods Are Not Drugs Act of 1985 - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exclude from the definition of "drug" and of "food additive" foods for special dietary use.

titles.title: Foods Are Not Drugs Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to restrict the authority of the Secretary of Health and Human Services with respect to regulating food as drugs.
